title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Greetings my fellow Naija people, happy children day to us. since am still new to dis forum the best thing that will help me to grow higher financially and materially like the way some of d guys here are displaying their achievement dey got from BTC investment, always give me joy and hope that one day I will make it too to celebrate ur senior men in dis forum. My question is, how many times do you guys use to make profits from ur BTC investment? Because I was told that we have long term investment and short term investments, and short term investments is from day to 6 months before u can sell to make profits while from 6 months to 4 years is long term investments. How many times do you guys use to make profits from short term investments before the end of  6 months or year because the price of BTC was very low through out last year 2022.I believe there are many people like me in dis forum that is using dis forum to learn so many things concerning BTC and crypto.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: That is true. Any investment that is less than six months should be regarded short term. Six month plus, to life time investment should be considered long term. It is not about how many times to make profit, it is about investing after bear market. Another time for good investment is some months or weeks before halving. We should be expecting all-time-high after the next halving.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: The time of earning from bitcoin investment is unlimited. If the set goal has arrived then reaping of what you have sown in the last two to three years is the most happiest day in every bitcoin user's life. If you invest in the bear market and when the bullish has come then reaping period has also come. It is not the time but how long have you started the journey of bitcoin investment and how far have you gone far.

comments.author: Iloveegusi
comments.body: Short term investment might end with losses since anything can happen like the fall of the exchange last year November. Long term has an higher chance of making mad profit due to bitcoin potential and all that

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: If you try to qualify bitcoin earnings for  time frame, e fit worry you and e no get any specific time way e dey take to earn specific amount of crypto if na inside investment you dey run. E no dey possible say you give predict watin go happen. People dey always reason say in the next 4years, anything way you don accumulate go double and that na because of bitcoin halving way dey always every 4years, just like we get for world cup. One thing way e dey always carry for body na bullrun and so, na there the hope dey come out.I go say if you wan run am, make you just dey do am with your spare money and no even dey reason say you wan withdraw in four years. Just dey put as you get  make e dey top up dey go. When time go come way you need am most, e go sure for you.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: I will categorize the earning in Bitcoin investment as luck and how patient you are to keep holding your Bitcoin.Short term investment is all about luck because if you are not lucky enough, there will not be much profit in return, while if you can be patient and wait for years, then with the potential Bitcoin has, there will be a very huge profit awaiting you.Quote from: Iloveegusi on May 29, 2023, 10:29:02 PMShort term investment might end with losses since anything can happen like the fall of the exchange last year November. All of the exchange fall and stories about altcoins are driving some new investors to lose patience since they believe their money is gone and would be difficult to recover from, but I am confident that if they are patient enough, the return will be enormous.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: What most of us does here is not really holding for long but always taking an advantages of the market instability to increase our chances of earnings. For instance, you may decide to buy bitcoin at 26k which I know around Last week it was in that price and if you are smart enough you wouldn't wait for the price to increase exponentially before you could make money from bitcoin. If you buy lows always target the right position to sell and accumolate your profits by so doing you will earn gradually by consistently doing it. But if you don't love that then you buy hand hold for bull run to make profits.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Do you need to always get worried when you invested on bitcoin than first understand the way you can learn and set in as an investor at the appropriate timing when the market is dip, you get your position and invest then monitor what you have invested by using decentralized wallet and also check the market trend to know the details of what's going on during your speculations, you can also trade or go on long time investment base on the level you are well pleased with and finally, you make target of the bullrun for maximum profitability.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Charles-Tim, smartvirus, Adbitco and mate2237 you guys really hit the point, I believe many of us has learned something new from u guys in this topic. Based on wat u guys just release here make me to believe that when I have money to invest in BTC, i should not just concentrate on long holding than to be more focus on d market price whenever it increase higher sell  and wait for another opportunity for d price to go down and buy and hold again. Dis is the reason why sometimes, I like to create topic in this our Naija local board to learn more from ur good senior men and women in dis platform to have more knowledge on BTC and crypto investment to grow higher like them in future.

How many times do you guys use to make profits from short term investments before the end of  6 months or year because the price of BTC was very low through out last year 2022.I believe there are many people like me in dis forum that is using dis forum to learn so many things concerning BTC and crypto.Long-term hodlers will eventually make profit, but short-term hodlers will constantly panic. If you consider bitcoin as an investment, avoid it if you are not willing to hold it for a long period of time since you will always be disappointed if you expect to profit from it in the short term. The concept of bitcoin was to return power to the people, to unbank the bank, to enable peer-to-peer transactions without third-party authorization, and, most importantly, to serve as a store of value.If you think Bitcoin is a get rich quick scheme, you're in the wrong boat, guy.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco If I were to ask you, would you endure this situation or you just panic and sell?I will sell if the situation is health challenge or something that concern my life or family health because I will feel that there will still be another opportunity to buy and hold. I have experienced some challenges in the past dat make me to start looking for wat to sell in my house to solve d challenges at the moment.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on May 27, 2023, 06:43:30 PMBecause I was told that we have long term investment and short term investments, and short term investments is from day to 6 months before u can sell to make profits while from 6 months to 4 years is long term investments. How many times do you guys use to make profits from short term investments before the end of  6 months or year because the price of BTC was very low through out last year 2022.I believe there are many people like me in dis forum that is using dis forum to learn so many things concerning BTC and crypto.First of all, you need to understand that when it comes to making profit in Bitcoin investment, it varies due to the nature of the market movement at the time of investment (i.e Bear or Bull), because an investment done during the "Bear" market period is bound to lose it's value at that moment unless left for a longer period, and likewise an investment done during the start/peak of a "Bull" period expected to yield huge profit as the value of Bitcoin is rising. So in other to make profit in either short or long term, as an investor you need to study the market to know what time best for which kind of Bitcoin investment.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on May 27, 2023, 06:43:30 PMI believe there are many people like me in dis forum that is using dis forum to learn so many things concerning BTC and crypto.While you dey believe this one also understand say nobi everything wey you read here be the thing wey those people wey dey give the advise dey do. Some people love to hide behind the username dem get to give advise wey dem demselves no dey actually follow so no allow follow follow make you miss road. Also no be every bragging of profits be legit, people sabi make up careless stories just to make demselves look good. Anything wey get to do with Bitcoin investment supposed be your own doing and nobi say you follow person. Wetin work for peter no go work for John so use ur head. Weather na one or two times oh wey you dey make profits, just make sure say you no lose.Personally self me no dey keep track, I just get Bitcoin, when my cash finish I sell Bitcoin get cash wey I go use run package around. If I do other business get cash I buy Bitcoin keep for my wallets. I no det keep track but wetin I know say if market make profits my Bitcoin wey I get go add value for my wallet and the same thing happen when the market no make profits. No dey care about how many times you go make profit, just dey buy Bitcoin dey keep for your wallet. When the market reach dat point wey e dey impossible to you dey cashout. You fit buy later of market crash go down wey be say panicking begin enter market.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: E get why we dey always advise people to DYOR (do your own research), and na because only you go fit take the final decision wey concern your investment, Bitcoin na long term investment true true, but e no mean say you no fit make ROI in the short term, just that e require more time and skill to dey study the market, to know when to buy and when to sell quickly.Having said that, remember say make you no use all your money go buy Bitcoin, no mind people wey dey talk say na get rich quick scheme, no believe them at all, e better say you use DCA strategy take dey buy your Bitcoin, e go help you to accumulate wella and as the price dey move up and down, e no go too affect you.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I'm a long-term hodler and am also a short-term trader; either way, I have mapped out a different wallet or amount that I wish to hodl for a long time until the target for such is hit. I don't even worry about price pomp or dump because I'm not in a hurry to sell. And in order not to be all left out, I also do short trading. I buy a few bitcoins and stocks somewhere, and watching the market closely, I sell them off when I realize a little profit from what I purchased them with. That's a continuous action; sometimes I do sell at the wrong time and later regret my actions, but it's what it is. The market won't always be in our favor, especially for day traders. Sometimes you lose, sometimes you win the trade, but you just have to know the right strategy to use in order to minimize your losses.So as a trader or holder, you just have to choose the best part that will be a better option for you, but it's always advisable for a newbie to practice either shot-term holding or long-term hodling; the long time is always preferable. In the short term, sometimes the price might not be in your favor when you want to cash out your investment.
